K10D0137_H0139:276a-1: a'arya sa m'a dhi aa gra autta ma /
K10D0137_H0139:276a-3: 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin mchog dam pa /
K10D0137_H0139:276a-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0137_H0139:276a-6: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na dge slong chen po'i dge 'dun sum khri dang /
K10D0137_H0139:276a-7: byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu chen po lnga stong tsam dang /
K10D0137_H0139:276a-9: klu la sogs pa sde brgyad dang /
K10D0137_H0139:276a-11: mi la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
K10D0137_H0139:276a-12: de ma yin pa gzhan yang phyogs bzhi'i mgon po bzhi dang /
K10D0137_H0139:276b-0: yi dvags la sogs pa sde @276b [?] 'ang 'khor der 'dus par gyur to //
K10D0137_H0139:276b-1: de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das 'od zer gyi ting
K10D0137_H0139:276b-2: nge 'dzin du bzhugs nas cang ma gsung zhing bzhugs
K10D0137_H0139:276b-3: pa las 'khor mang po rnams the tshom du gyur
K10D0137_H0139:276b-4: to; ;de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon
K10D0137_H0139:276b-5: nu chos kyi rgyal bu 'dug pa las langs te
K10D0137_H0139:276b-6: sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas tshigs
K10D0137_H0139:276b-7: su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do
K10D0137_H0139:276b-8: // shin tu legs so chos kyi rje //
K10D0137_H0139:276b-9: ting nge 'dzin la zhi bar bzhugs //
K10D0137_H0139:276b-11: thams cad the tshom skyes par gyur //
K10D0137_H0139:276b-12: shin tu legs so nyi zla'i 'od //
K10D0137_H0139:276b-13: cang mi gsung bar snang mi mdzad //
K10D0137_H0139:276b-14: shin tu legs so rin chen gter //
K10D0137_H0139:276b-15: dbul phongs rnams la sbyin mi mdzad //
K10D0137_H0139:276b-16: shin tu legs so mi yi rgyal //
K10D0137_H0139:276b-17: ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs su gsol //
K10D0137_H0139:276b-18: shin tu legs so klu yi rgyal //
K10D0137_H0139:276b-19: bdud rtsi'i char pa dbab tu gsol //
K10D0137_H0139:276b-20: shin tu legs so lha yi mchog /
K10D0137_H0139:276b-21: myur du chos rnams bstan du gsol //
K10D0137_H0139:276b-22: shin tu legs so sems can la //
K10D0137_H0139:276b-23: theg pa gcig don bstan du gsol //
K10D0137_H0139:276b-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las
K10D0137_H0139:276b-25: bzhengs nas 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces
K10D0137_H0139:276b-26: bka' stsal to // nga la rin po che bla
K10D0137_H0139:276b-27: na med pa'i ye shes mang du yod pa khyod
K10D0137_H0139:276b-28: la phan pa dang bde bar mdzad cing dbul phongs
K10D0137_H0139:276b-29: pa dang bral bar bya ba yod kyi /
K10D0137_H0139:277a-0: the tshom ma byed par ci @277a *//
K10D0137_H0139:277a-2: de nas dga' bo stan las langs te sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0137_H0139:277a-5: mang du thos pas bla na med pa'i byang chub myur du 'thob snyam na /
K10D0137_H0139:277a-6: mdo sde dag las bshad pa thos pa ltar na
K10D0137_H0139:277a-7: mang du thos shing shes rab rno ba'i dbang po
K10D0137_H0139:277a-9: byang chub thob pa shin tu dka' ste /
K10D0137_H0139:277a-12: bdag gis ji ltar bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur /
K10D0137_H0139:277a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0137_H0139:277a-14: dga' bo; mang du thos pa la sems rnam pa gnyis te /
K10D0137_H0139:277a-18: sems ting nge 'dzin la gnas na ni /
K10D0137_H0139:277a-19: mang du thos pas kyang gnod pa med do //
K10D0137_H0139:277a-20: sems 'khrul pa la gnas na ni /
K10D0137_H0139:277a-21: mang du thos pas kyang phan pa med de /
K10D0137_H0139:277a-23: shes rab dang shin tu ldan na /
K10D0137_H0139:277a-24: myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro //
K10D0137_H0139:277a-27: ci'i slad du mdo kun las ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10D0137_H0139:277a-31: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0137_H0139:277a-34: shes rab tu ldan pa ni /
K10D0137_H0139:277a-36: ri dvags kyi nang na sengge mchog tu gyur pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:277b-0: snang ba @277b thams cad kyi nang na nyi ma mchog tu gyur pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:277b-1: ri'i nang na ri rab lhun po mchog tu gyur pa lta bu'o //
K10D0137_H0139:277b-4: shes rab tu ldan pa'i shugs ni /
K10D0137_H0139:277b-5: mchog dam pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0137_H0139:277b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0137_H0139:277b-8: gal te mi zhig gis shing tsandan las stong gsum
K10D0137_H0139:277b-9: gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i
K10D0137_H0139:277b-10: gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:277b-11: mi gzhan zhig gis rin po che sna bdun las
K10D0137_H0139:277b-12: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
K10D0137_H0139:277b-13: gang ba'i gtsug lag khang byas na; mi de gnyis
K10D0137_H0139:277b-14: kyi bsod nams mnyam pa yin nam /
K10D0137_H0139:277b-16: mi de gnyis kyi nang na rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i bsod nams mchog go /
K10D0137_H0139:277b-17: sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0137_H0139:277b-18: gzhan yang mi zhig gis gser tha mal pa las
K10D0137_H0139:277b-19: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
K10D0137_H0139:277b-20: gang ba'i gtsug lag khang byas pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:277b-21: mi gzhan zhig gis gser btso ma las stong gsum
K10D0137_H0139:277b-22: gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i
K10D0137_H0139:277b-24: de gnyis kyi bsod nams mnyam pa yin nam /
K10D0137_H0139:277b-26: gser btso ma las byas pa'i bsod nams rab tu che'o //
K10D0137_H0139:277b-27: sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0137_H0139:277b-28: gal te mi zhig gis shing tsandan dang /
K10D0137_H0139:278a-0: spos kyi shing gzhan dag las stong @278a *//
K10D0137_H0139:278a-1: gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang
K10D0137_H0139:278a-2: ba'i sku gzugs byas te mchod pa byed cing phyag
K10D0137_H0139:278a-3: 'tshal ba dang / mi gzhan zhig gis gser btso ma dang /
K10D0137_H0139:278a-4: rin po che sna bdun las stong gsum gyi stong
K10D0137_H0139:278a-5: chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i sku gzugs
K10D0137_H0139:278a-6: byas te mchod pa byed cing phyag 'tshal na /
K10D0137_H0139:278a-7: mi de gnyis kyi bsod nams la khyad par yod dam /
K10D0137_H0139:278a-9: rin po che sna bdun dang /
K10D0137_H0139:278a-10: gser btso ma las sku gzugs bgyis pa'i bsod nams che'o //
K10D0137_H0139:278a-11: sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa; gal
K10D0137_H0139:278a-12: te mi zhig gis sbyin pa chen po'i sems bskyed
K10D0137_H0139:278a-13: de rin po che sna bdun gyi bang mdzod dang
K10D0137_H0139:278a-15: bu sbyin pa byin pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:278a-16: mi gzhan zhig gis yan lag gi dam pa mgo dang /
K10D0137_H0139:278a-19: rnyed dka' ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyi bang mdzod kyi sbyin pa byin na /
K10D0137_H0139:278a-20: mi de gnyis kyi bsod nams la khyad par ci yod /
K10D0137_H0139:278a-21: dga' bos gsol pa; rin po che sna bdun dang /
K10D0137_H0139:278a-24: bur bcas pa'i sbyin pa'i bsod nams che ba lags so //
K10D0137_H0139:278a-25: sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0137_H0139:278a-26: gal te mi zhig gis mdo sde bcu gnyis stong
K10D0137_H0139:278a-27: gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang
K10D0137_H0139:278a-28: ba'i mi rnams la 'jig rten du spel te klog
K10D0137_H0139:278a-29: cing kha ton byed du 'jug pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:278b-0: de la mi zhig @278b gis stong gsum gyi stong
K10D0137_H0139:278b-1: chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i mi rnams
K10D0137_H0139:278b-2: yi ge bzhin du 'don cing yi ge dang don
K10D0137_H0139:278b-3: stong cing khong du chud na /
K10D0137_H0139:278b-4: mi de gnyis kyi bsod nams gang che /

K10D0137_H0139:278b-7: sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0137_H0139:278b-8: gal te mi zhig gis mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang
K10D0137_H0139:278b-9: thogs pa med par kha ton du shes la don
K10D0137_H0139:278b-10: zab mo mi shes par mdo sde glegs bam yang
K10D0137_H0139:278b-11: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
K10D0137_H0139:278b-13: de la mi zhig mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang byang
K10D0137_H0139:278b-14: bar kha ton shes la don zab mo'ang rtogs te
K10D0137_H0139:278b-15: / mdo sde'i glegs bam yang stong gsum gyi stong
K10D0137_H0139:278b-16: chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba tsam 'chang
K10D0137_H0139:278b-17: na; mi de gnyis kyi bsod nams gang mchog tu
K10D0137_H0139:278b-18: / gyur pa yin / dga' bos gsol pa /
K10D0137_H0139:278b-19: kha ton bgyis la don yang rtogs te /

K10D0137_H0139:278b-22: gal te mi zhig gis mdo sde bcu gnyis 'grel cing 'chad la /
K10D0137_H0139:278b-29: btang snyoms mi spyod pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:278b-30: gal te mi zhig gis mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang 'grel cing 'chad la /
K10D0137_H0139:279a-5: btang snyoms kyang rgya cher spyod /
K10D0137_H0139:279a-6: sems can rnams la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar sems snyoms na /
K10D0137_H0139:279a-7: mi de gnyis bsod nams gang che ba yin /
K10D0137_H0139:279a-14: bzod pa spyod cing sems can la sbyin pa byin pa'i bsod nams che zhing mang ba lags so //
K10D0137_H0139:279a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0137_H0139:279a-16: gal te mi zhig gis mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang
K10D0137_H0139:279a-17: 'grel cing 'chad shes la bstan bcos 'u ta bco

K10D0137_H0139:279a-19: spel ba dang / de la mi zhig gis mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang 'grel cing 'chad shes la /
K10D0137_H0139:279a-22: phung po lnga'i bstan bcos dang /
K10D0137_H0139:279a-23: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bcu gnyis kyi bstan bcos dang /
K10D0137_H0139:279a-24: khams bco brgyad kyi bstan bcos dang /
K10D0137_H0139:279a-25: stong pa chen po'i bstan bcos dang /
K10D0137_H0139:279a-27: zla ba sbrin gyi bstan bcos dang /
K10D0137_H0139:279a-28: mdo sde rgyan gyi bstan bcos dang /
K10D0137_H0139:279a-29: don dam pa nyid kyi bstan bcos dang /
K10D0137_H0139:279a-30: rdo rje snying po'i bstan bcos dang /
K10D0137_H0139:279a-31: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bstan bcos dang /
K10D0137_H0139:279b-0: rnam par thar pa'i @279b sgo gsum gyi bstan bcos
K10D0137_H0139:279b-1: la sogs pa bstan bcos 'u ta bco lnga'ang shes
K10D0137_H0139:279b-11: sems gnyis su med cing nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:279b-12: sems can gyi skyon thams cad mi mthong zhing sems
K10D0137_H0139:279b-13: can rnams la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar snyoms
K10D0137_H0139:279b-14: te dgra sdang ba la'ang nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa
K10D0137_H0139:279b-15: dang / de la mi zhig gis phyogs su rgyas
K10D0137_H0139:279b-16: pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis la skur pa mi 'de
K10D0137_H0139:279b-17: dang / bas na / mi de gnyis kyi bsod nams gang che ba yin /
K10D0137_H0139:279b-19: phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis la skur ba ma btab na /
K10D0137_H0139:279b-20: mi de'i bsod nams tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis te /
K10D0137_H0139:279b-21: bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags so //
K10D0137_H0139:279b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0137_H0139:279b-23: gzhan yang mi zhig gi gong du smras pa'i bsod
K10D0137_H0139:279b-24: nams thams cad kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
K10D0137_H0139:279b-25: 'jig rten gyi khams gang bar byed nus la mdo

K10D0137_H0139:279b-32: mang du thos pa'i mchog tu'ang gyur la chos thams cad stong zhing zhi ba'i don yang ston te /
K10D0137_H0139:280a-1: pa'i mngon bar shes pa lnga thob par byed de /

K10D0137_H0139:280a-6: mang du thos pa'i gang zag ni /
K10D0137_H0139:280a-7: ri'am rgya mtsho ltar nga rgyal gyi sems che'o //
K10D0137_H0139:280a-8: de ltar nga rgyal che ba ni /
K10D0137_H0139:280a-9: ngan song du bskal pa grangs med kyi bar du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0137_H0139:280a-10: dmyal ba de las thar na'ang 'dab chags kyi byar skye bar 'gyur na /
K10D0137_H0139:280a-11: mang du thos pa la phan pa ci yod /
K10D0137_H0139:280a-12: gang la bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin yod pa ni /
K10D0137_H0139:280a-13: skye shi 'khor ba'i sdig kha na ma tho ba'i las lci ba byang bar nus so //
K10D0137_H0139:280a-20: bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin ni /
K10D0137_H0139:280a-24: bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin ni /
K10D0137_H0139:280a-28: bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin ni /
K10D0137_H0139:280a-30: ngas bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi bsod nams dang /
K10D0137_H0139:280a-33: bskal par yang mi rdzogs so //
K10D0137_H0139:280a-34: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal gangs
K10D0137_H0139:280b-0: mngon sum du dran pa sngon 'das @280b pa'i dus
K10D0137_H0139:280b-1: na mang du thos pa'i skye bor gyur pa'i tshe
K10D0137_H0139:280b-2: 'jam dpal dang nga gnyis yod med gnyis la rtsod
K10D0137_H0139:280b-8: yod med gnyis kyi bden pa la rtsod par gyur te gcig tu ma chad do //
K10D0137_H0139:280b-9: tha ma tshe 'phos nas ngan song du skyes par gyur te /
K10D0137_H0139:280b-10: bskal pa grangs med kyi bar du lcags kyi thu lum za bar gyur to //
K10D0137_H0139:280b-11: dmyal ba de las thar te sangs rgyas 'od srung dang phrad nas yod pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:280b-12: med pa'i bden pa gnyis 'od srung gis 'di skad du bshad do //
K10D0137_H0139:280b-13: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni /
K10D0137_H0139:280b-14: gcig tu nges shing chad pa med de /
K10D0137_H0139:280b-17: don de lta bu ma yin no //
K10D0137_H0139:280b-20: stong pa nyid kyis zhi ba ste /
K10D0137_H0139:280b-25: yi ge'i don shes par zad kyi /
K10D0137_H0139:280b-26: don zab mo mi shes pas don 'di lta bu ni /
K10D0137_H0139:280b-27: khyed dmus long dam 'on pa lta bu yin na /
K10D0137_H0139:280b-28: don zab mo 'di lta bu ji ltar shes shing
K10D0137_H0139:280b-29: rtogs par gyur ces bshad pa thos nas ri dben
K10D0137_H0139:280b-30: par song ste / bdag nyid yid la byas nas bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so //
K10D0137_H0139:280b-31: zhag bdun lon pa dang bsam gtan zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

K10D0137_H0139:281a-0: @281a *// don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
K10D0137_H0139:281a-1: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'di dag rtogs shing khong du chud par gyur te /
K10D0137_H0139:281a-2: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis zhi ba ci'ang med par rtogs so; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K10D0137_H0139:281a-4: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0137_H0139:281a-7: mchog dam par rig par bya ste /
K10D0137_H0139:281a-10: nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin bsgoms na /
K10D0137_H0139:281a-11: bskal pa grangs med pa tshun chad kyi kha na
K10D0137_H0139:281a-12: ma tho ba'i sdig lci ba'ang khad kyis zhi zhing
K10D0137_H0139:281a-14: gzhan yang kha na ma tho ba'i sdig lci ba'ang 'byang bar 'gyur te /
K10D0137_H0139:281a-17: dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:281a-19: gtsug lag khang bshig pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:281a-20: dge 'dun gyi gnas khang mes btang ba yin te /
K10D0137_H0139:281a-24: rang bzhin gyi lci ba drug nyams pa yin /
K10D0137_H0139:281a-25: phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde la skur pa btab pa yin /
K10D0137_H0139:281a-26: pha rol po'i nyes pa'i skyon smra zhing bkur sti mi byed pa yin /
K10D0137_H0139:281a-27: gang du skyes par nga rgyal che ba dang /
K10D0137_H0139:281a-28: rang bzhin gyis sdig lci ba yang yin te /
K10D0137_H0139:281a-29: de'ang bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin bsgoms na rang zhi zhing 'byang bar 'gyur /
K10D0137_H0139:281b-0: de'ang bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi @281b mthus 'byang gi /
K10D0137_H0139:281b-1: gzhan gyis 'byang ba ma yin no //

K10D0137_H0139:281b-3: bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'thob na /
K10D0137_H0139:281b-4: tshe gcig tu dben par ri dang shing drung du 'dug ste rtog pa bsal ba dang /
K10D0137_H0139:281b-6: spong ba yid la byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /

K10D0137_H0139:281b-11: gcig btang yang gcig la 'dzin to //
K10D0137_H0139:281b-13: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis mi g-yo'o //
K10D0137_H0139:281b-15: chos thams cad la 'khrul ba'i 'du shes skye'o //
K10D0137_H0139:281b-16: gal te ting 'dzin la gnas na ni /
K10D0137_H0139:281b-20: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis zhi ba /
K10D0137_H0139:281b-28: dri za'i grong khyer lta bu /
K10D0137_H0139:281b-32: bar snang gi bya'i rjes lta bur rtogs so //
K10D0137_H0139:281b-33: 'jig rten na srid pa ri dang /
K10D0137_H0139:281b-39: rgya mtsho la sogs pa chu thams cad kyang me'i
K10D0137_H0139:281b-40: bskal pa chen po byung ba'i tshe thams cad tshig
K10D0137_H0139:281b-41: cing zad par 'gyur yang bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10D0137_H0139:281b-42: gzugs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bzhi ma gtogs ta /
K10D0137_H0139:282a-0: @282a *// chos thams cad stong pa nyid du shes na bsam gtan gyi mthu ni /
K10D0137_H0139:282a-1: shin tu bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o //
K10D0137_H0139:282a-2: sems ting nge 'dzin la gnas na /
K10D0137_H0139:282a-3: phyogs bcu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nyi ma dang /
K10D0137_H0139:282a-13: skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu lag mthil du bzhag pa bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0137_H0139:282a-14: bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas na /
K10D0137_H0139:282a-15: rdzu 'phrul gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i
K10D0137_H0139:282a-16: klung gi bye ma snyed du'ang phyin cing phyogs bcu'i
K10D0137_H0139:282a-17: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rlung dang /
K10D0137_H0139:282a-30: klu'i pho brang yang rdzu 'phrul gyis sprul nus te /
K10D0137_H0139:282a-31: de bas na bsam gtan gyi mthu ni /
K10D0137_H0139:282a-32: shin tu bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya /
K10D0137_H0139:282a-33: bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi shugs kyis stong
K10D0137_H0139:282a-34: gsum gyi stong chen po'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
K10D0137_H0139:282a-37: moonggal gyi bu chen po ting nge 'dzin du zhugs
K10D0137_H0139:282a-38: nas ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam pa sna tshogs su
K10D0137_H0139:282a-39: sprul cing ting nge 'dzin gyis sa chen po 'di'ang
K10D0137_H0139:282a-40: mgal me bskor ba bzhin du bskyod nus te /
K10D0137_H0139:282b-0: @282b de ltar mi nus par rig par bya'o //
K10D0137_H0139:282b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la khyod sa chen po sgul cig cas bka' stsal pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:282b-3: bdag la bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin ma mchis pas sgul rngo mi thogs so //
K10D0137_H0139:282b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0137_H0139:282b-5: bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin sgom pa dge sbyong
K10D0137_H0139:282b-6: gi 'bras bu bzhi ma thob kyang mang du thos
K10D0137_H0139:282b-7: pa las khri phrag brgya stong gis 'phags so //
K10D0137_H0139:282b-8: de'i tshe de'i dus na 'od ma'i tshal na gnas
K10D0137_H0139:282b-9: pa'i dge slong lnga brgya tsam zhig thams cad mang
K10D0137_H0139:282b-10: du thos bar rlom pa las /
K10D0137_H0139:282b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0137_H0139:282b-12: moonggal gyi bu chen po'i rdzu 'phrul dang /
K10D0137_H0139:282b-14: zhes gsungs pa thos nas sangs rgyas gang na ba
K10D0137_H0139:282b-15: der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
K10D0137_H0139:282b-16: bos phyag 'tshal nas sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces
K10D0137_H0139:282b-17: gsol to // bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag mang
K10D0137_H0139:282b-18: du thos pa bslab ste mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang
K10D0137_H0139:282b-19: khod du chud pas rgyal khams chen po bcu drug
K10D0137_H0139:282b-20: snyed kyang bdag cag la sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar
K10D0137_H0139:282b-21: gus shing bkur sti bgyi na /
K10D0137_H0139:282b-22: ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa ni /
K10D0137_H0139:282b-23: nam yang bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0137_H0139:282b-24: zhes gsungs zhes gsol pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:282b-25: bcom ldan 'das la dge slong lnga brgya po mthun par dus gcig tu bdag cag ni /
K10D0137_H0139:283a-1: thos pa spang zhing bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la slob bo zhes gsol to //
K10D0137_H0139:283a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0137_H0139:283a-4: khyed mang du thos pa spangs te bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug go /
K10D0137_H0139:283a-8: sbrang bu'i 'dab mas nyi zla sgrib par 'dod pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:283a-9: dmus long gis ri rab lhun po la 'dzeg par 'dod pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:283a-10: gru gzings med par rgya mtsho la rgal bar 'dod pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:283a-11: bya 'dab ma chag pa nam mkha' la 'phur 'dod pa bzhin khyed kyang de dang 'dra'o //
K10D0137_H0139:283a-13: dge slong rnams shi ba tsam du 'jigs shing skrag pa'i sems skyes so //
K10D0137_H0139:283a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0137_H0139:283a-15: dge slong khyod ma 'jigs ma skrag par sems ting nge 'dzin la zhog cig /
K10D0137_H0139:283a-16: dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa /
K10D0137_H0139:283a-17: bdag cag la bsam gtan gyi mthu'ang ma mchis na /
K10D0137_H0139:283a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0137_H0139:283a-20: nga la sman dam pa yod de /
K10D0137_H0139:283a-21: khyed ting nge 'dzin thob par bya'o //
K10D0137_H0139:283a-23: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol /
K10D0137_H0139:283a-24: bdag cag gis de bzhin du spyod par 'tshal lo //
K10D0137_H0139:283b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' @283b stsal pa; sman dam pa zhes bya ba ni /
K10D0137_H0139:283b-6: dge slong rnams kyis gsal pa /
K10D0137_H0139:283b-10: spong ba ci lags bdag cag gis ma 'tshal na /
K10D0137_H0139:283b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol /
K10D0137_H0139:283b-12: de nas sangs rgyas kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0137_H0139:283b-14: rtog pa zhes bya; sems gnyis byung ba ni /
K10D0137_H0139:283b-21: bsam gtan dang po la rtog pa zhes bya /
K10D0137_H0139:283b-22: bsam gtan gnyis pa la bsal ba zhes bya /
K10D0137_H0139:283b-23: bsam gtan gsum pa la 'jug pa zhes bya /
K10D0137_H0139:283b-24: bsam gtan bzhi pa la spong ba zhes bya'o //
K10D0137_H0139:283b-26: bsam gtan zhes bya ba ni /
K10D0137_H0139:283b-27: lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:283b-28: sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:283b-29: chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:283b-30: tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te /
K10D0137_H0139:283b-31: de bzhin du mngon par shes pa bzhi dang /
K10D0137_H0139:283b-33: 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
K10D0137_H0139:283b-34: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
K10D0137_H0139:283b-37: mtshan ma med pa bzhi dang /
K10D0137_H0139:283b-39: dge slong khyed bsam gtan dang po'ang gsal bar ma rtogs na /
K10D0137_H0139:284a-0: @284a *// chos thams cad lta ci smos /
K10D0137_H0139:284a-1: dge slong dag thabs sna tshogs kyis bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o //
K10D0137_H0139:284a-2: gal te mi gtsang ba la rtog na /
K10D0137_H0139:284a-3: lus kyi chen po bzhi bags pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:284a-7: snod pu ga dgu yod pa'i nang du chu blugs
K10D0137_H0139:284a-8: na zag pa bzhin du mi gtsang ba'i dngos po
K10D0137_H0139:284a-10: btsog pha shin tu skyor rung ba zag pa mthong ngo //
K10D0137_H0139:284a-11: ting nge 'dzin de las kyang dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs mthong ba ni /
K10D0137_H0139:284a-17: rnam par nag pa tha dad pa sna tshogs mthong bas sems ma 'khrul bar gyur na /
K10D0137_H0139:284a-18: dngos po de dag mthong ba'i tshe phyir bzlog par bya'o //
K10D0137_H0139:284a-20: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba bgrang ba'i rtog pa'ang de dang 'dra'o //
K10D0137_H0139:284a-21: gal te tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhi nyams pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:284a-22: dge slong mas rtsa ba brgyad nyams pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:284a-23: dge ba snyen mas khrims kyi rtsa ba lnga nyams pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:284a-24: dge tshul gyis khrims bcu nyams pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:284a-25: dge slong mas lci ba drug nyams ba dang /
K10D0137_H0139:284a-26: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi spyi'i dkor brkus pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:284a-31: dge 'dun gyi dkor brkus pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:284b-0: @284b phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde la skur ba'i gang zag de lta bu ni /
K10D0137_H0139:284b-1: bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa'i tshe bdag gi lus dang /
K10D0137_H0139:284b-2: ngag rlung nag po lta bu dang /
K10D0137_H0139:284b-4: me rab tu 'bar ba 'dra ba dang /
K10D0137_H0139:284b-6: ri dang brag lta bu dang /
K10D0137_H0139:284b-10: sprul lam rtsangs pa lta bur mthong ba dang /
K10D0137_H0139:284b-11: lag na me chen po thogs te rlung chen po la rgyug pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:284b-12: mgo la ri chen po khyer zhing langs kyang rdab 'chos pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:284b-14: mig nas 'bar ba mo 'byung ba dang /
K10D0137_H0139:284b-15: sna nas sbrul chen po 'byung ba dang /
K10D0137_H0139:284b-16: rna ba nas 'phar spyad 'byung ba dang /
K10D0137_H0139:284b-17: bshang gci che chung chu lta bur 'bab cing rgya mtsho lta bur mthong ba dang /
K10D0137_H0139:284b-18: gal te phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad cho 'phrul rnam pa mang po ston pa mthong na /
K10D0137_H0139:284b-19: mtshan ma de lta bu mthong ba'i tshe bsam gtan
K10D0137_H0139:284b-20: las langs te tshal lam ri dgon bar song ste
K10D0137_H0139:284b-21: phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'don cing 'gyod tshangs
K10D0137_H0139:284b-22: bya'o // de ltar sngon gyi kha na ma tho ba'i sdig 'gyod tshangs bya ba'ang zhag bdun nam /
K10D0137_H0139:284b-28: bdun bdun gyi bar du mthol tshangs bya'o //
K10D0137_H0139:284b-29: de ltar sdig sbyangs nas bsam gtan bsgom par bya ste /
K10D0137_H0139:284b-30: de la sdig chung ba ni /
K10D0137_H0139:285a-0: bags dkyis bdag gi lus bee d'urya'i ri lta bur mthong bar @285a *//
K10D0137_H0139:285a-2: gang rtsa ba bzhi ma nyams pa nas rang bzhin
K10D0137_H0139:285a-3: gyi khrims lci ba lnga'i bar du ma nyams pa
K10D0137_H0139:285a-4: ni / ting nge 'dzin du 'jug pa'i tshe phyogs
K10D0137_H0139:285a-5: bcu'i sangs rgyas dus gcig tu chos ston pa dang
K10D0137_H0139:285a-6: ni / / de yang na bden pa bzhi'am /
K10D0137_H0139:285a-7: yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi'am /
K10D0137_H0139:285a-12: 'jig rten mchog gi chos ston pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:285a-13: yang na byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
K10D0137_H0139:285a-15: skyes bu ya brgyad kyi chos dang /
K10D0137_H0139:285a-18: rnam par thar pa brgyad ston par mthong ba dang /
K10D0137_H0139:285a-19: ting nge 'dzin las mun nag mthong ba dang /
K10D0137_H0139:285a-21: ting nge 'dzin de las langs te shin tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o //
K10D0137_H0139:285a-23: dge slong dag phyir gnas pa'i tshal du dong ste
K10D0137_H0139:285a-24: bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin nyin zhag bdun bsgoms
K10D0137_H0139:285a-25: pas thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa thob par gyur
K10D0137_H0139:285a-26: nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags te
K10D0137_H0139:285a-27: sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0137_H0139:285a-30: sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa bzhin 'khor ba las thar te bla na med pa'i 'bras bu thob bo //
K10D0137_H0139:285a-31: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0137_H0139:285a-32: de ltar thob na cho 'phrul bstan pa'i dus la bab bo //
K10D0137_H0139:285b-1: dge slong lnga brgya rnams steng gi bar snang la 'phags te nyal ba dang /
K10D0137_H0139:285b-6: chu la sogs pa 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul rnam pa bco brgyad mngon par bstan te /
K10D0137_H0139:285b-7: de'i tshe mang du thos pa'i dge slong rnams bsam
K10D0137_H0139:285b-8: gtan bsgoms pas moonggal gyi bu chen po dang 'dra
K10D0137_H0139:285b-9: bar rdzu 'phrul tha mi dad par gyur to //
K10D0137_H0139:285b-10: de nas dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0137_H0139:285b-12: dam pa'i chos 'di de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan
K10D0137_H0139:285b-13: las 'das nas ji srid du gnas shing dus ngan
K10D0137_H0139:285b-14: pa'i tshe sems can ji snyed cig chos 'di bsgoms
K10D0137_H0139:285b-15: pas / dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par 'gyur /
K10D0137_H0139:285b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0137_H0139:285b-17: da da phyin chad dpyid zla 'bring po la rtsva mchog gi grong khyer du mya ngan las 'da'o //
K10D0137_H0139:285b-18: nga mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgyad cu'i bar
K10D0137_H0139:285b-19: du chos la spyod pa'i sems can mang du 'byung
K10D0137_H0139:285b-20: ste / dur khrod dang shing drung na gnas shing 'di yid la byed de /
K10D0137_H0139:285b-24: spong ba'i chos spyod pa stong phrag bcu la stong
K10D0137_H0139:285b-25: phrag dgus dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par
K10D0137_H0139:285b-26: 'gyur ro; ;lo sum brgya'i bar du ni /
K10D0137_H0139:285b-27: sems can stong phrag brgya la stong phrag bcus dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10D0137_H0139:285b-29: lo lnga brgya tshun chad ni /
K10D0137_H0139:286a-0: @286a *// nga'i nye gnas rnams bags kyis mi dge ba'i chos spyod do //
K10D0137_H0139:286a-1: phrag dog gi sems kyis log pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0137_H0139:286a-2: stong phrag lnga brgya la stong phrag bcus dge sbyong gi 'bras bu thob bo //
K10D0137_H0139:286a-4: brgyad brgya tshun chad nga'i nye gnas rnams khyim pa'i gos gyon nas ba lang dang /
K10D0137_H0139:286a-8: rta gso zhing 'bru mang po gsog ste /
K10D0137_H0139:286a-9: rang gi lag dar zhing rang za ba dang /
K10D0137_H0139:286a-12: de'i tshe stong phrag stong la stong phrag gcig gis
K10D0137_H0139:286a-13: dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par 'gyur ro
K10D0137_H0139:286a-14: // lo brgyad brgya phan chad nas lo stong tshun chad ni /
K10D0137_H0139:286a-15: nga'i nye gnas rnams sdig pa'i chos bslab ste /
K10D0137_H0139:286a-19: khyim bdag la grogs por bsten cing phan tshun tha na 'phrin gyis 'drul zhing /
K10D0137_H0139:286a-24: rin po che sna bdun gsog cing sha za zhing
K10D0137_H0139:286a-25: chang 'thung ste chen po bzhi gso zhing rtas par
K10D0137_H0139:286a-26: byed pa dang / smad tshong ma ltar gos spu gu gyon zhing 'drid pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:286a-27: slu ba'i las byed de; de la 'bum phrag khri
K10D0137_H0139:286a-28: la brgya tsam zhig gis dge sbyong gi 'bras bu
K10D0137_H0139:286a-29: bzhi thob bo // lo stong phan chad /
K10D0137_H0139:286b-0: nga'i nye gnas rnams @286b lus chos gos gyon yang
K10D0137_H0139:286b-1: shing gi kha la 'phan rnying btags pa 'dra ste
K10D0137_H0139:286b-3: khyim pas mthong na'ang bkur sti mi byed pas sha na pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0137_H0139:286b-4: de'i dus na yul khams kyang 'khrugs te /
K10D0137_H0139:286b-5: gcig la gcig dgra byed cing gsod pas rgyal po dang /
K10D0137_H0139:286b-9: bu mo'ang gcig la gcig dgra byed de /
K10D0137_H0139:286b-11: snying brtse ba'i sems kyang med pas bza' ba dang /
K10D0137_H0139:286b-20: dbang po ma tshang ba dang /
K10D0137_H0139:286b-23: yul khams phung bar byed pa /
K10D0137_H0139:286b-24: 'tsho bas rang mi sos pa dag nga'i chos la
K10D0137_H0139:286b-25: zhugs nas khyim pa rnams kyis kyang rngon pa dang
K10D0137_H0139:286b-30: bal glang myos pa ltar gdul dka' ba /
K10D0137_H0139:286b-33: slob ma'ang mi rgod ma rungs pa dang 'dra ste /
K10D0137_H0139:286b-34: 'dod chags la bag med par spyod cing /
K10D0137_H0139:286b-36: 'og ma'i rim pa'ang med pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:286b-37: bzang ngan gyi rim pa'ang med de /
K10D0137_H0139:286b-39: kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa mang po byed
K10D0137_H0139:286b-40: cing ngan song gsum gyis mi 'jigs par gar song
K10D0137_H0139:286b-41: bar gnas kyang chang tshong ba dang /
K10D0137_H0139:287a-0: @287a *// smad tshong ma dang sten cing 'grogs pa /
K10D0137_H0139:287a-1: kha nas kyang ngag sdig pa smra zhing sems la'ang sdig pa sems pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:287a-2: yang na blon po dang sten cing dge ba'i mi
K10D0137_H0139:287a-3: dag la thabs sna tshogs kyis bsdigs shing nor 'phrog
K10D0137_H0139:287a-5: yang na rngon pa'i yo byad nya rgya la sogs
K10D0137_H0139:287a-6: pa 'chang zhing nya la sogs pa bcus nas rang
K10D0137_H0139:287a-7: gi lag bdar te gsod pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:287a-10: shi ba'i tshe gso sbyong mi byed de rang nyams su gtong ba dang /
K10D0137_H0139:287a-11: tshul khrims kyi las byed pa rnams phan tshun rtsod cing /
K10D0137_H0139:287a-14: grogs po la zhe sdang ba dang /
K10D0137_H0139:287a-15: gdug pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:287a-17: slob ma'ang gcig la gcig skyon 'dru zhing 'phya ba dang /
K10D0137_H0139:287a-18: sgrog pa'i gtam smra ste; dper na /
K10D0137_H0139:287a-19: rtsangs pa mang po kun gcig tu 'dus pa dang 'dra ba dang /
K10D0137_H0139:287a-20: phan tshun dpung dang sde tshan gcig la gcig tshig ngan gyis sma 'bebs pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:287a-21: bla 'og gi rim pa'ang med pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:287a-22: mi rgod ma rungs pa ltar dge ba byed pa las 'phrog rlom byed pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:287a-23: khe dang grags pa la chags te chos mi shes
K10D0137_H0139:287a-24: par gyur pa de'i tshe mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang
K10D0137_H0139:287a-25: nub par gyur te klog pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:287a-27: de'i slob ma rnams kyang dgra chos dang /
K10D0137_H0139:287b-6: rta rgyug pa la sogs pa'i chos ma yin pa slob cing spyod de /
K10D0137_H0139:287b-7: de ltar ma legs pa'i chos spyod pas tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan song du lhung ste /
K10D0137_H0139:287b-8: bskal pa grangs med par ngan song gi sdug bsngal
K10D0137_H0139:287b-9: myong nas de las thar nas yang byol song du
K10D0137_H0139:287b-12: sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:287b-13: khal lci ba 'gal zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0137_H0139:287b-14: phyi zhig na sbyangs pa'i yon tan slob pa'ang chos ma yin pa mang du byed de /
K10D0137_H0139:287b-18: shing drung na mi gnas shing rtag tu grong du rgyug ste /
K10D0137_H0139:287b-19: sems la rtog pa mang zhing khe dang grags pa tshol te /
K10D0137_H0139:287b-21: longs spyod la chags shing chog mi shes pa dang /
K10D0137_H0139:287b-22: chos ston pa'i bshad mkhan zhig yin na'ang sangs rgyas
K10D0137_H0139:287b-23: kyi chos ston pa'ang khri tsam la gcig tsam yang
K10D0137_H0139:287b-25: 'khor mang po dang 'grogs nas grong rgyu zhing khyim
K10D0137_H0139:287b-26: pa'i khyim du zhugs nas khyim pa la chos ston
K10D0137_H0139:287b-27: pa'ang khe dang grags pa'i phyir te /
K10D0137_H0139:287b-28: longs spyod mang du gsog cing shan pa dang 'dra'o //
K10D0137_H0139:287b-29: sha dang chang la mi spyod pa dag gis dge slong dag /
K10D0137_H0139:287b-31: btsun pa khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba yin na /
K10D0137_H0139:287b-32: snying rje'i sems kyang med de /
K10D0137_H0139:288a-0: 'di ltar chos ma yin pa mang du @288a *//
K10D0137_H0139:288a-3: zhes spyod zhing brgyad par 'gyur ro //
K10D0137_H0139:288a-4: dge slong de dag de skad gshe ba thos nas kun log ste /
K10D0137_H0139:288a-7: brgyad bkag ste gcig la gcig 'di skad du smra'o //
K10D0137_H0139:288a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i tshe na ni /
K10D0137_H0139:288a-9: nged sha dang chang 'thung ba ma gnang ste /
K10D0137_H0139:288a-10: da nged de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas da ni /
K10D0137_H0139:288a-11: ci'ang gnang ba deng sha dang chang 'thung ba yin no //
K10D0137_H0139:288a-12: khyim pa dang bral ba'i 'og tu de dag gcig
K10D0137_H0139:288a-13: la gcig bdag cag gis shes pa ni; sangs rgyas
K10D0137_H0139:288a-14: kyi zhal nas gsungs pa dang 'dra'o //
K10D0137_H0139:288a-20: 'khrul pa'i tshig tu gtam smra zhing dper na /
K10D0137_H0139:288a-21: dmus long zhig mdzub mo gnyis nyi ma la btsugs te /
K10D0137_H0139:288a-27: mi 'on pa zhig bdag gis gnam gyi steng na chos 'chad pa'i sgra thos so //
K10D0137_H0139:288a-28: zhes zer ba dang 'dra bar dmus long mang po tshogs te 'jig rten na 'jam dpal dang /
K10D0137_H0139:288a-29: 'od srung chen po la sogs pa sprul te /
K10D0137_H0139:288a-30: de'i nang na bzhugs kyang kun gyis rdeg cing gshe ste /
K10D0137_H0139:288a-31: de nas skrod cing 'dug tu mi ster ro //
K10D0137_H0139:288a-34: spos kyi ri la gnas te /
K10D0137_H0139:288b-0: gcan gzan gang @288b yang gnas der nye mi bzod do //
K10D0137_H0139:288b-1: sengge ri de las byung ste song ba'i 'og tu ni /
K10D0137_H0139:288b-2: gcan gzan gdug pa khro ba la sogs pa gcig
K10D0137_H0139:288b-3: gis gcig bos te spos kyi ri la lhags nas
K10D0137_H0139:288b-4: 'bras bu zhim po za zhing chu mig la 'thung
K10D0137_H0139:288b-5: ngo // de ltar za zhing 'thung ba las thams cad bskams shing med par gyur te /
K10D0137_H0139:288b-6: spos kyi ri la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang skyo
K10D0137_H0139:288b-7: ba par mi 'gyur bas rtsva gdug pa skyes te
K10D0137_H0139:288b-8: zos ma thag tu tshe'i dus byas par 'gyur ro
K10D0137_H0139:288b-9: // nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dge
K10D0137_H0139:288b-10: slong thams cad kyis ngas bstan pa'i mdo sde bcu
K10D0137_H0139:288b-11: gnyis 'don cing klog pa'ang gong ma ni /
K10D0137_H0139:288b-20: don ma yin pa la don zhes zer /
K10D0137_H0139:288b-22: don ma yin zhes zer te /
K10D0137_H0139:288b-23: ji ltar mu stegs can dag so so nas nga'i gzhung ni /
K10D0137_H0139:288b-26: de'i dus na mdo sde bcu gnyis 'jig rten na spyod kyang gzi brjid dang /
K10D0137_H0139:288b-28: la la zhig 'don tam klog kyang mi gcig 'ga'
K10D0137_H0139:288b-29: yang dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob pa med
K10D0137_H0139:288b-30: do // de ltar nga'i slob ma rnams kyang rgyal po srid stor pa'am /
K10D0137_H0139:288b-31: bya 'dab ma med pa dang 'dra ste /
K10D0137_H0139:288b-33: mchod rten yang stongs shing zhig ral gso ba'ang med do //
K10D0137_H0139:289a-1: gdugs yod pa'ang dgra cha zhig pa dang 'dra ste /
K10D0137_H0139:289a-6: lug la sogs pa'i tshang dang /
K10D0137_H0139:289a-8: dge slong so so na 'dug pa'i gnas ni /
K10D0137_H0139:289a-9: byi dor bzang du byed do //
K10D0137_H0139:289a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0137_H0139:289a-11: 'di'ang khyed la mdo tsam zhig bshad pa yin no //
K10D0137_H0139:289a-12: dga' bos sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas mchi ma blags te ngus so //
K10D0137_H0139:289a-13: de ltar dga' bos yid gdung zhing du ba ma btang ba las /
K10D0137_H0139:289a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa;
K10D0137_H0139:289a-15: khyod de ltar ma du bar mdo sde 'di gzungs
K10D0137_H0139:289a-16: su bzung la 'jig rten du rgyas par spel cig
K10D0137_H0139:289a-17: / de nas dga' bos gdong mchi ma phyis nas
K10D0137_H0139:289a-18: bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis gzungs su gzung ngo
K10D0137_H0139:289a-22: mi rnams kyis kyang dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0137_H0139:289a-24: bdag cag gis yongs su bzung ste /
K10D0137_H0139:289a-29: dur khrod na gnas te 'don tam /
K10D0137_H0139:289a-31: bdag cag gis lha dang mi'i 'khor dang /
K10D0137_H0139:289a-32: mi ma yin ba dang bcas te gnas der 'gro
K10D0137_H0139:289a-33: zhing chung ngu na tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam
K10D0137_H0139:289a-34: / tshig gcig tsam yang mi brjed mi nyams par gzung ngo //
K10D0137_H0139:289b-0: mdo sde 'di @289b gsungs pa'i tshe dge slong stong
K10D0137_H0139:289b-1: snyed kyis dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par
K10D0137_H0139:289b-2: gyur to // dge slong ma stong lnga brgyas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
K10D0137_H0139:289b-3: dge bsnyen lnga brgya yongs su dag par gyur te /
K10D0137_H0139:289b-6: lha ma yin la sogs pas phyag byas nas phyir dong ngo //
